id: scenario-value-scanner-young-adult-scenarios-educational-learning household management skills not taught in formal education
title: Learning household management skills not taught in formal education
description: Learning household management skills not taught in formal education
content:
Scenario: Learning household management skills not taught in formal education
    Given Aisha's college education didn't include life skills
    And she needs practical household management capabilities
    When Aisha uses the Value Scanner educational features
    Then the personal_agent should teach grocery shopping efficiency
    And it should provide meal planning education
    And it should teach nutrition basics within budget constraints
    And it should explain waste reduction strategies
    And practical life skills should be taught through direct application
    And education should fill gaps from formal schooling
